quest.name: Vanaspati's Blessing
journal:
Maru is looking to distribute delicacies.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Deliver the freshwater weeds to Maru.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Forename... Have you ever gazed into a hippo's big, dark eyes and known in your heart there ain't nothin' cuter in this whole wide world? I sure have...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Makes me wanna give 'em all their favorite treats─fruit, veggies, alfalfa...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: An' freshwater weeds! Those are so popular among our 'pots, I can never seem to pick enough...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: I feel a freshwater feast comin' on, so could you wrangle us some weeds? You can find 'em sproutin' from the banks of Ksiroda, just east of Yedlihmad. Three bundles would make me─and our sweet hippos─forever grateful!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: And we feast tonight! We used to save these for special occasions since they only grow in southern Thavnair, but I guess movin' down here has its perks.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Still─the waters of Ksiroda flow from Vanaspati, you know? So in a way, it's like our old home is still takin' care of us. ...That's what I like to think, anyway.
